de.rojer.editablefiles

Class StringFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.rojer.editablefiles.EditableFile
      • de.rojer.editablefiles.StringFile

  • public class StringFile
extends EditableFile
    This class can read and load all characters from a text file
    Version:
    17.3.2019
    Author:
    Rojer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String source
      The text of the file

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringFile(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String fileName)
      Call this method to find a file (when not found, create) and copy all its text into a usable variable
